page.content: interest to his readership.He writes book reviews for the reviews page.He also writes the leader column which is the paper's voice on local issues. The rest of his work is concentrated on organising what else is to go in the current issue.On Thursdays he visits the printers and the managing director and people who run the company. A journalist who works on the paper told us about his job.He had no set routine but covered any local events or anything interesting happening locally.He regularly attended council meetings,the local magistrates court and called in at frequent intervals at the local police station to see what was happening on the crime front.He enjoyed the varied nature of his job and would like to go on to work for a national newspaper.
